body.p:
Mckee Jackson County Ky
March the 22 day 1861
To his Excellency Beriah Magoffin

Your petitioner, Joseph Underwood would Most Respectfully Represent to your Excellency, that at the Last nov term of the Jackson Circuit ^court^ your pertioner was find twenty dollars for Being Charge of Living in Adultery with one Polley stephens

now your Pertitioner would Most Respectfully ask your honer to Remit said Fine Fine, as I am About sixty years of Age and verry poore as Respects Land & property and sence the finding of the virdict I have had to gow to Lexington and have My Right arm Cut off From the Affects of an oald ulcer or cancer

We the undersigned are well Acquainted with the said Joseph Under wood and do say the facts in his pertition are true and think it would be an act of charity to Remit the fine as the Commonwealths atterny and the officers at the court have Remite thar costs

Isaac J Fawley T. J. F. J. C and P J J C
Thos, J,, Engle Clk circuit & county court

Jackson Cir. Ct
$20 } adultery
Jos. Underwood
Remission Issd Apr 9. 1861.
